update T_SUMS_OC_COMPLAINT
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMPLAINT_OBJECT = #{complaintObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPLAINT_MATTER = #{complaintMatter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_SUMS_OC_COMPLAINT set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMPLAINT_OBJECT = #{complaintObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPLAINT_MATTER = #{complaintMatter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESION = #{resion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=DATE}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=DATE} CREATER_ID = #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDIT_ID = #{auditId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from T_SUMS_OC_COMPLAINT where status = 0 and is_deleted = 0 or AUDIT_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE T_SUMS_OC_COMPLAINT SET IS_DELETED = 1 WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM T_SES_BMS_ATTACHMENT WHERE BUSINESS_ID = #{businessid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND IS_DELETED = 0 AND TYPE_ID = #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
